examples.example: 我相信不久之后我一定能实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: I believe that I will surely realize my dream in the near future.

examples.example: 不久之后，我们就可以一起去享受那美好的旅程了。

translate.english: Soon after, we can go to enjoy that wonderful journey together.

examples.example: 不久之后，我们的生活一定会变得更加美好。

translate.english: Soon after, our life will definitely become more beautiful.
